TicTacToe.project-description: The classic two-player tic-tac-toe using Java Script as logic

Calculator.project-description: Simple web calculator, using Java Script for the logic, HTML and CSS for the front-end.

PickPixelColor.project-description: Application, programmed in Python, that allows to extract the hex of a screen pixel.

ImageAscier.project-description: Image Ascier, converts images into ASCII representations using text characters.
